# CPBarButtonHandler

**Type Alias**

A block that CarPlay calls when the user taps a bar button.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CPBarButtonHandler = (CPBarButton) -> Void
```

## Creating a CarPlay Bar Button

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a button initialized  from data in the specified coder object.
- **init(type:handler:)**: Creates a bar button with a type and handler.
- **init(image:handler:)**: Creates a bar button that displays an image.
- **init(title:handler:)**: Creates a bar button that displays a text label.
- **CPBarButton.Type**: Types of bar buttons.
